title: Labels Not appearing correctly in tracklets, but fine in analyze videos
body:
Thanks for opening this issue, and thanks for using DeepLabCut (we hope you are enjoying it ;). Please fill out the template completely, including the full "traceback" and input code that you ran to hit this error.

**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**

Please state your operating system, env, and which version of DeepLabCut you are using.
Example: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & DeepLabCut1.x or 2.x.

Please complete the following information about your system:

OS:  Windows 10
DeepLabCut Version: 2.2
Anaconda env used: GPU

I analyze the videos and that step works fine, however, afterwards I look at the tracklets GUI and one mouse is not labeled for certain parts of the video. Sometimes the labels appear in positions where the mouse isn't. 


[Please copy/paste the full terminal output of the error here!!!]

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57931859/98744698-02c4fd00-2367-11eb-932d-2bf6c10ca0fa.png)


**How to Reproduce the problem**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to Refine Tracklets
2. Click on Launch GUI
3. Go through the frames
4. See error


**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57931859/98744679-f771d180-2366-11eb-92d3-01a07640f690.png)



**Additional context**
I am not sure if this means that I loaded the wrong files, but I did click on the .pickle file and the corresponding video.
